Hi there, my name's Rudy and I like video games, the outdoors, and my dog sais i'm a pretty great guy. I enjoy branding, packaging, and web design. I also pride myself on being a big fan of all things Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. I always try to put aside some time to explore the world of design and develop new skills all the while remembering that each day is a gift.
